trans-unit.source: Specifies the starting character position of the selection.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the starting character position of the selection.

target.mrk: Specifies the starting character position of the selection.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the ending character position of the selection.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the ending character position of the selection.

target.mrk: Specifies the ending character position of the selection.

trans-unit.source: The start value can be greater than the end value.

seg-source.mrk: The start value can be greater than the end value.

target.mrk: The start value can be greater than the end value.

trans-unit.source: The lower of the two values specifies the character position of the first character in the selection.

seg-source.mrk: The lower of the two values specifies the character position of the first character in the selection.

target.mrk: The lower of the two values specifies the character position of the first character in the selection.

trans-unit.source: The higher value specifies the position of the first character beyond the selection.

seg-source.mrk: The higher value specifies the position of the first character beyond the selection.

target.mrk: The higher value specifies the position of the first character beyond the selection.

trans-unit.source: The start value is the anchor point of the selection, and the end value is the active end.

seg-source.mrk: The start value is the anchor point of the selection, and the end value is the active end.

target.mrk: The start value is the anchor point of the selection, and the end value is the active end.

trans-unit.source: If the user uses the SHIFT key to adjust the size of the selection, the active end can move but the anchor point remains the same.

seg-source.mrk: If the user uses the SHIFT key to adjust the size of the selection, the active end can move but the anchor point remains the same.

target.mrk: If the user uses the SHIFT key to adjust the size of the selection, the active end can move but the anchor point remains the same.

trans-unit.source: If the $iStart is 0 and the $iEnd is –1, all the text in the edit control is selected.

seg-source.mrk: If the $iStart is 0 and the $iEnd is –1, all the text in the edit control is selected.

target.mrk: If the $iStart is 0 and the $iEnd is –1, all the text in the edit control is selected.

trans-unit.source: If the $iStart is –1, any current selection is deselected.

seg-source.mrk: If the $iStart is –1, any current selection is deselected.

target.mrk: If the $iStart is –1, any current selection is deselected.

trans-unit.source: The control displays a flashing caret at the $iEnd position regardless of the relative values of $iStart and $iEnd.

seg-source.mrk: The control displays a flashing caret at the $iEnd position regardless of the relative values of $iStart and $iEnd.

target.mrk: The control displays a flashing caret at the $iEnd position regardless of the relative values of $iStart and $iEnd.
